shortDescription: Expert bookkeeping services with 35+ years of accounting experience. QuickBooks ProAdvisor, BBB A+ Rated. Free consultations. Serving Henderson, Nevada and nationwide remotely.
longDescription: Balance Your Books LLC brings over 35 years of accounting experience and offers a comprehensive range of services including data entry, bank reconciliations, journal entries, inventory valuations, depreciation schedules, accounts payable, accounts receivable, adjusting journal entries, and preparation of financial statements. We specialize in month-end and year-end closing procedures. As a QuickBooks ProAdvisor, we are experts in QuickBooks and QuickBooks Point of Sale, and also have extensive experience with a variety of other accounting software platforms such as Timberline, MAS 90, PC Advisor, American Contractor, Micros/Aloha, and Compete, just to name a few. Our commitment is to perform the tasks entrusted to us with professional skill, integrity and accuracy. Services can be done at our office or at your location. We include free accounting support when you have questions or get stuck on something. We meet deadlines and make sure your financials and tax returns are filed correctly and on time. We are proud to be A+ rated with the Better Business Bureau.
